Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison and Inner Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison and Inner Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: SB 156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.
